node.name: EggCrate Acoustic foam sheet MAKE: YGM ACOUSTIC
node.description: For experimental point of view, this high density polyurethane sheet is first option for soundproofing the wall under piggy bank price. Streamline EggCrate allignment provide the larger surface area which result in larger absorption of vibrations.(20dB = Ticking watch / 110dB = Screaming child / 140dB = Gunfire) (SIZE: 6feet x 3feet x 2inch / WEIGHT: 500 gram / RATE: Rs.133 per Sqfeet / COLOR: Charcoal Balck)
node.content: 1> Larger quantity always cost less and this point can easily be seen on the application rate of this polyurethane sheet which has a high density of 50 Kg per CubicMeter /2> With 2 inch of thickness it can easily label the undulation of wall and also provide more resistance towards wear and tear /3> NRC(Noise Reduction Coefficient) of this acoustic sheet is greater than 1.00 hence it absorbs 100% of vibration generated by impacted sound(Kindly, note that we are talking about vibration and not energy, a Sound is a form of energy) /4> Easy to mount or demount over wall with accessories available in local markets or STC(Sound transmission class /5> Sound reduction index) is also greater than 32dB, which means if we place this foam in interior partition wall and create 100dB(too loud to hear) sound in one room than it cuts the 32dB sound from it and pass only 68dB sound to adjacent room.
node.alt: YGM Acoustic Foams® Egg Crate Tray Soundproofing (6x3 Sheet - Single) Studio Acoustic Foam - 2 Inches

node.name: Wedge Acoustic foam sheet MAKE: MMT ACOUSTIX
node.description: Effective soundproofing material against reverberating sound which is different than echo in asepct of frequency. Square shape with wedge pattern on surface provide flexibility in orientation and create multiple patterns.(50dB = Rainfall / 120dB = Rock concert / 150dB = Rock music at peak) (SIZE: 3feet x 3feet x 2inch / WEIGHT: 150 gram / RATE: Rs.177 per Sqfeet / COLOR: PURPLE / NUMBER OF SHEETS: 2)
node.content: 1> The most effective soundproofing materials depends on where one person are trying to soundproof and what noise he or she trying to soundproof /2> Thin layer (thickness not disclosed) of acoustic fiberglass is sandwiched between the 2 inch polyurethane sheet so that to make it possible to absorb the high frequency reverberating sound /3> Square(3feet x 3feet) size can be fit to door which normally are of size 7feet x 3feet and also in a single package 2 sheets are delivered and therefore without wastage user can completely soundproof his or her door /4> NRC(Noise Reduction Coefficient) of this acoustic sheet is greater than 0.90 hence it absorb 90% of vibration generated by impacted sound(Kindly, note that we are talking about vibration and not energy, Sound is a form of energy) /5> Approved by ARAI(Automotive Research Association of India) on STC(Sound transmission class /6> Sound reduction index) value greater than 32dB which means if we place this foam in interior partition wall and create 100dB(too loud to hear) sound in one room than it cuts the 32dB sound from it and pass only 68dB sound to adjacent room.
node.alt: MMT Acoustix® Wedge Studio Soundproofing Acoustic Foam (3x3 Feet, Studio Purple, 2 Pcs
